#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
bool prime[10001];
int main() {
    for (int x=2; x<=10000; x++) {
        prime[x]=true;
	}
	for (int x=2; x<=10000; x++) {
        if (prime[x]) {
            for (int y=2*x; y<=10000; y+=x) {
                prime[y]=false;
            }
        }
	}
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	for (int x=0; x<t; x++) {
        int n;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        int count=n-1;
        bool used[n];
        for (int t=0; t<n; t++) {
            used[t]=false;
        }
        for (int y=2; y<n; y++) {
            if (n%y==0 && prime[y]) {
                for (int z=y; z<n; z+=y) {
                    if (!used[z]) {
                        used[z]=true;
                        count--;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n", count);
	}

	return 0;
}
